next_steps.note: "Define the scope of 'focus poetry'. What sub-genres, themes, or forms will be prioritized (e.g., haiku, free verse, nature, love)?",
"Research and compile a small collection (5-10 poems) of existing 'focus poetry' examples to serve as inspiration and establish a baseline.",
"Brainstorm potential themes or prompts for original 'focus poetry' creation. Add these to the 'Ideas' list.",
"Create a 'Progress' tracking system - outline what constitutes 'completion' for the project (e.g., number of poems written, style established, collection size).",
"Start drafting the first 'focus poem' based on one of the brainstormed themes/prompts. Document any challenges in the 'Issues' list."
